pota waradda gaththayin passe thama therenne ban.mama danna dokek innawa.uu polisiyatath gana digena gabsa job eka karanne.wishwasha karapan dawasakata 25,30k enawama thama.aduma gane dawasakata 20 k nam shuwar.wishwasha karapalla awu 14 kelloth aran enawalu lamayi nathi karanda.katada me wanchawa karanne?winadi 20.30 aathal ekakata thamage aathma gawurawe nathi kara gannawa.eelangata oya kella awalangu kasiyak wage.

sambadhaka ka්ramanukulawa iwath kerunu athara aayojana saha aadhara sandaha tharawkarakam karamin juntawa sandaha karakgasana thanapathi keneku bawata suki path wiya. 2016 di suparikshakariwa paripalitha mathiwaranayakin en el diye jayaga්rahanaya kirima saha su ki yatha lesa ma aanduwe nayakaya lesa path karanu labima sansthapithaye madhyayan, madhyama panthika libaralun saha wiwidha wyaja wama sanwidhana wisin sarwathrika wa uthkarshayata nanwuye pa්rajathantha්rawadaye malpala ganwimak washayeni.

2012 wasaredi juni masayedi ek riyadurekuta gewa athi athikala mudala pamanak ru. 1,38,825 k wi athi bawath, shri lankan guwan samagame athikala gewime kramawedaya anuwa gananaya kala awasthawedi ema riyadura ema masaye sama dinakama paya 15.4 k pamana athikala sewaya kara thibena bawath aya piligaththa.

man paraya ee idama wikkane”ohu thama aduradarshi kriyawata thamantama tokkak anagaththe ee wachanawalin.surendra ‘duwili’ natyayen nawatha wedikawata piwisena wita ‘yashorawaya’ rupawahiniye wikashanaya wi ‘wirasekara ankal’ bhumikawa wenuwen ohu itha ihala prekshaka prathichara labamin sitiya.

thawada inpasuwa (ohuta wenath) malayikawarunda udawkaruwan washayen sitinu atha. 66-5 shuddha wu kuraanaya (apage nabiwaraya wana) ohu obawa thalak pawasa (aath) wuwahoth (oba wenuwata) obatath wada usas aya wana -wandambauwan ho kanyawan ho- muslimwarun wana wishwasaya thabu, (dewiyanta) biya wi (awanatha wi) katayuthu karana, papayangen aath wu, (dewiyanwa) namadina, upawasaye yedena kanthawanwa ohuge dewiyan ohuta bharyayawan bawata path kara thabiya hakiya.

palath palana mathiwaranaya sandaha siyalu deshapalana paksha janawari masa 14 wanida sita siya mathiwarana meheyum wyaparaye yedi siti athara, mathiwaranayen pasuwada, methek amathyanshawala katayuthu nisiparidi aarambhakara nomatha.

ithin methan sita obe pradeshaye pawathina pusthakala parishrayan paladayitha sankalpa thulin warnawath kirima sandaha mema wadapiliwela samaga sambandhawime prawesha doratuwa oba wenuwen wiwruthawa pawathi.
ee athara siya diwiyata samudun aya da sitiyaha.
rawi karunanayaka aswimata pera kala prakashaya yu.en.pi. pakshikayange hadawatha aamanthranaya kirimak bawa samaharan kiyanne me pasubima yatatheya.
namuth asadharanaya balagena nihandawa kondak nathi kenek lesa labena pablisiti wadasatahan mata epa.

me thaththwayan magaharawa ganimata hondama wisanduma lesa ma dutuwe gewaththe ida thibena than wala thamanta haki aakarayata yamak waga kara ganimayi.
mata nam oone thanaka kagahanawa ahuna nam (fon eken) ee ape aya kiyala dannawa.
meya sidu wanne gamiya chandadayakaya lesath, gama mulika eekakaya lesath, salakana sruju mathiwarana kramayak magini.
dasin kiya ee gi katha..

mokada mata amathaka wenne me pissu wada?
oyata ee hangima eetath wada danenawa athi.
danuth eeka ehemamayi.
aw rallak waten nathi wele nawala eeki asanipa weyi.” “sandagen saddayak na.

sama waidyawarayekuma pudgalikawa hamuwannata amathaka nokarana mowunta nidahas adhyapanayen bihiwu lankika waidyawaru thama rogin pawadimata nopakiliwa idiripath wethi.

sakachja sabhawa amathamin katha kala shri lanka thanapathi rawinatha aariyawansha kiya sitiye manawa himikam mandalaya samaga digatama katayuthu karamin mema yojanawata sama dayakathwaya dimata shri lankawa sudanam bawayi.
ee sa digu kalak mage hadawathe randi thibunu ee chithra padama, eya sadahatama nawathena dinaya dakwa elesama pawathinu atha.
me thamayi aluthma aluth prathipala:

siduwuna yayi kiyana mema siduwim sambandha awanka soyabalime unanduwak rajaya wethin pashchath yuda kalaya thula palanowunu bawa warthawa dakwayi.eeta amatharawa adhikaranaya deshapalanikakaranaya wima,nithipathi dhuraye wishwasaniyathwaya bida watima,madhya wala kriyakarithwaya sima kirima,rajyaya wisin uthuru pradeshaye genayana militari pannaye palanaya,miya giya ha athurudahan wu aya sambandha nisi wadapiliwelak anugamanaya wi nothibima,awathan wuwan sambandha prashastha wadasatahanak diyath wi nothibima,hadisi nithiya ha thrasthawadaya walakwime panatha wani mardhana nithiwala kriyakarithwaya,athadanguwata gath damila radawiyan sambandha adhikarana kriyadamayak nopawathima yanadi karunuda warthawa magin awadhanayata lakkota thibe.
eda palakayan thamange mathi amathiwarunge wancha dushana sangawagena thamanta awashya aakarayata owunwa palanaya kirimata uthsaha kala.
paranawithana mahatha adahas karanne sidath sangarawe ena pathiraja dewa amathyayath, pujawaliyehi ena dewa pathirajath dedenaku bawayi.
liwimedi da akuru patalawa liwima, waradi paththata akuru liwima, akuruwala wama, dakuna marukara liwima, akuru adukara ho ekathukara liwima, wani adupadu siduwiya hakiyi.
ee uba ube hayiya ee maha sada paharata puja karapu nisa kiyala thama mama thaniyama hithuwe.
eheth ewani margayak ayata nothibini.

me anuwa wasara 69k wani shri lanka deshapalana ithihasaya thula siw wana waratath aandukrama wyawasthawak sandaha ketumpathak idiripathwa thibe. 2000 wasaredith mebanduma ketumpathak chandrika palana samayedi idiripath wi atha.
eksath jathinge manawa himikam mandalayedi shri lankawa sambandhayen yojanawak sammatha wima gana thama pakshaya kanagatu wana bawa eksath jathika pakshaya kiya sitiyi.
ada janadhipathithumage kathawe di kiyawna dushanaya saha akaryakshamathawaya nathi karanna uwamana bawak.
“hari thaththe mama kakula thadata thiyan hitiyata ..me .....me balanna man lissala yanna hadanne ....akki ....“
meya purwadarshayak bawata pathwuwahoth yam chodanawak matha usawiyakata idiripath karanu labana kisindu rajaye sewakayakuta thamage nirdoshibhawaya oppu kirimata kramayak nathiwanu atha.
ape jiwitha kale athule wechcha sira siddi tikak (tikak kiwwata godak) oyalata kiyanna thamayi me blog eka haduwe.

eheth budurajanan wahanse lanwathma owhu thaman karagath kathikayehi pihita sitinnata nohaki wuha.

1921 di deli niwus puwathpathe kalamanakaruwaku wu oliwar gunathilaka mahatha in pasuwa dumriya departhamenthuwe ganakadhikari, aanduwe sahakara ganakadhikari oditar janaral, mahajana aarakshaka komasaris, aahara komasaris, mudal lekam, senet sabhapathi, engalanthaye shri lanka maha komasaris, mudal amathi saha nidahas shri lankawe prathama agrandukara thanathura dakwama usas thanathuru daruweya.

apiwa hirageka neweyi hiragewal dahaka dammath api mahinda mahaththaya agamathi karala misak aapasu harenne naha.

apata sitinu daksha rupanawediyaku sema natya ha ranga kalawa wisha mama uganwanne baෲsli ge satan kalawa mama uganwanne baෲsli ge satan kalawa mama uganwanne baෲsli ge satan kalawa senaka wijesinha baෲsli kung fu kiyana satan kalawa honkon dupathe hadarapu kenek.

ee athara eeye (10da) sakshi wibhagaya atharathuradi agamathi ranil wikramasinha mahatha kandawa ohugen karunu wimasana lesata bandumkara ganudenuwe barapathalama chodanawanta lakwa sitina hitapu maha banku adhipathi arjun mahendran wisinda nawatha nawathath kihipa warakma prakasha kirima nisa niyatha washayenma komisama hamuwata ohu kandawimata komisamata siduwanu athayi janadhipathi lekam karyala prakashakayekda sandahan kaleya.
ammala thaththala witharak neweyi serama nadayo dan mawa ganan ganne kanawandumiyak widiyata.
mema yuddhaya siduwune spanynyaye mundayi nagarayedi.
kiyawala iwara weddi ehema hithunath kament kiyawala aapahu ehema hithuna..lassana kathawak male..widusara paththare thiwuna eewa wage..

dan muslim konga්rasaya kiyanawa, nagaෙnahira palathe palanaya demala jathika sandhanayata bhara denawa kiyala.

disthrikkaye pasal 605 ka guruwarun 15,100 kata ennatha labadimata niyamitha bawayi uuwa palath adhyapana adhyaksha di.em. rathnayaka sandahan kale.me ada dinayedi korona ennatha labagath guruwarun kihipadeneku ee pilibandawa dakwu adahas.me athara kolambaa adhyapana kalapayata ayath siyaluma rajaye pasal saha paudgalika pasalwala widuhalpathiwarun, guruwarun saha anadhyayanaya karya mandalaya sandaha sayinofam ennatha elambaena 12 wana da sita labadimata salasum kara thibenawa.ee anuwa ennathe palamu mathrawa narahenpita yuda hamuda rohaledi 12 wana da sita 16 wana da dakwa labadena bawayi kolambaa kalapa adhyapana karyalaya sandahan kale.
“ehenan chuti puthata kanna dawal bath athi…”

sewana lotharayiya haraha niwasa thana dima sidu kala.

balayata eema sandaha rajapakshawarunta erehiwa wedika gane kiw janamadhyayata erehi aparadha sambandhayen komisamak pathkara karunu soya bala eeta wagakiwayuththanta nithiya hamuwe danduwam labadena lesa shri lanka wruththiya janamadhyawedinge sangamaya owungen karana lada illim aluyama lu kela pindak se iwatha heluwe ada apa dakimin sitina ohu thula nidangatha wi sitina aththa sirisena nisa wiya yuthuya.

idiri janadhipathiwaranayedi rajapaksha janadhipathiwarayata erehiwa podu apekshakayeku idiripathkirima sambandayen mathuwi thibena sakachchawa nawa adhiyarakata elambaemin…

methana rajapakshala ganna narakayi.

oonama salasumak sarthaka wanuye thama prathiwadi pile pawathina durwalatha handuna ganima saha eewata paharadima matha misa thamange purasaram matha noweya yanna, wipakshaye sitina deshapalana balawega boho awastha waladi amathaka karana karanayaki.

habayi apata piliganna wenawa prathiwirodhatha nisama deparshwayata madhyastha ekangathawak athikaraganna oona kiyala.
